mapper.sql: t.id as id, t.pcode as pcode, t.pname as pname, t.password as password, t.is_it as isIt, t.part_id as partId, t.po_id as poId, t.insert_time as insertTime, t.update_time as updateTime, t.update_user_pcode as updateUserPcode
mapper.select: select mui.pcode, mui.pname, mw.work_date as workDate, mw.`week`, case when mw.`status` = 1 then '上班' when mw.`status` = 2 then '事假' when mw.`status` = 3 then '调休' when mw.`status` = 4 then '病假' when mw.`status` = 5 then '公务外出' else '异常' end as workStatus, time_format(mw.start_time,'%H:%I:%S') as startTime, time_format(mw.end_time,'%H:%I:%S') as endTime from mf_work mw left join mf_user_info mui on mw.user_id = mui.id where mui.pcode = #{query.pcode} and mw.work_date >= #{query.workStartDate} and mw.work_date <= #{query.workEndDate} order by mw.work_date
